attributes.action: Manage the use of camera phones in childcare
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The aim of the ‘no camera phones in childcare campaign’ is to manage the use of camera phones in childcare by restricting their use around the children. This could involve staff leaving their camera phones in the staff room, office, locker etc. This will hopefully prevent another “predator” from being able to abuse other children in this way.
